programme.title: World Finals
programme.desc: Monster Jam World Finals 2025 - LIVE from Salt Lake City! All-out racing, pulse-pounding stunts, big air and unbelievable wow moments as the world’s best drivers compete for a World Championship!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: Rice-Eccles Stadium - Salt Lake City, UT
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series West closes out the series with three thrilling competitions from Rice-Eccles Stadium as Adam Anderson looks to lead Grave Digger to back-to-back event championships in Salt Lake City.

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: World Finals XXIII - Sofi Stadium - Los Angeles, CA - Racing
programme.desc: Monster Jam World Finals 23 crowns the first two champions of the 2024 season with The Great Clips Two Wheel Skills Challenge and JCB Racing. Plus, the world premiere of Sparkle Smash.

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: World Finals XXIII - Sofi Stadium - Los Angeles, CA - Freestyle - 2024
programme.desc: Monster Jam World Finals 23 continues with the Lucas Oil High Jump and then the 24-truck field competes in the BKT Freestyle Championship, and Fortnite crashes the World Finals Party in Inglewood.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam returns to Lucas Oil Stadium as Tom Meents continues his final season of Maximum Destruction looking for his league leading fifth freestyle win, but will Tyler Menninga disappoint Max-D fans as he goes for his seventh event championship of the year.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam heads to the racing capital of the world, Indianapolis, with Stadium Championship Series Blue. Grave Digger’s Tyler Menninga continues to ride a wave of momentum as he tries to win his 6th Overall Event Championship of the season while Colt Stephens looks to climb up the series points leaderboard by earning his second consecutive Freestyle win.

programme.title: Championship Series
